en_text: That'll be a sight to see!
jp_text: そりゃまた 豪儀なことで！
google_translated: That's why it's a good thing!

en_text: -What was that? -Upstairs?
jp_text: 何だ！ 上か？
google_translated: What!Is it up?

en_text: They got her!
jp_text: やられた！
google_translated: They got me!
